entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
